title: IHC Annual Report 2024 Financial Highlights
description: IHC released its Annual Report for the year 2024, highlighting a 52.0% increase in total assets to AED 401.8 billion as of December 31, 2024. The report includes significant financial growth with revenue rising by 54.2% to AED 92.7 billion, profit after tax increasing to AED 25.7 billion, net debt at AED 16.5 billion, and cash & bank balance reaching AED 55.2 billion. Other key metrics such as net profit margin, EPS, total debt, total liabilities, return on assets, return on equity, quick ratio, and total equity show substantial growth compared to 2023. The report outlines the company's strategy, portfolio, key developments, and financial results for FY 2024.

title: IHC Annual Report 2024 Highlights Strategic Growth and AI Integration
description: In 2024, IHC reported strong financial performance with total assets reaching AED 401.8 billion and earnings per share of AED 7.2. The company strategically repositioned its investments, optimizing its portfolio by divesting select businesses and reinvesting in high-growth, future-ready industries. IHC emphasized its commitment to the UAE's economic strength and expanded across diverse sectors. A significant focus was placed on embedding Artificial Intelligence across all sectors, leveraging AI-driven efficiencies such as predictive analytics and automation to enhance operational excellence and value generation.

title: IHC's Strategic Investment Approach and Global Expansion in 2024
description: In 2024, IHC, established in 1999, operates as the most valuable holding company in the Middle East and one of the largest global investment firms with a market capitalization of AED 892 billion. With over 1,200 subsidiaries across more than 41 countries and involvement in 86 joint ventures and associates, IHC continues to expand globally. Their diversified portfolio spans asset management, healthcare, real estate, financial services, IT, and more, emphasizing innovation, autonomy of subsidiaries, and dynamic value network creation to adapt to market dynamics and seize emerging opportunities.

title: Emirates Stallions Group increases stake in Decovision
description: Emirates Stallions Group increased its stake in Decovision to 85% with an AED 61.4 Mn investment, reinforcing its position in the UAE’s interior design and furniture manufacturing sectors.

title: NMDC Energy oversubscribed IPO
description: NMDC Energy began trading on ADX on 11 September 2024 following its IPO of 1.15 billion shares representing 23% of the company’s total share capital. The IPO was oversubscribed 31.3 times and raised AED 3.2 Bn.

title: ADMO Lifestyle Holding acquisition of L Capital
description: ADMO Lifestyle Holding acquired a 99.1% stake in L Capital for AED 190.8 Mn on January 1, 2024, aiming to expand its global lifestyle footprint in Asia. ADMO also holds investment in Ce La Vi, a Michelin-starred restaurant.

title: Palms Sports acquisition of Learn Educational Investment
description: Palms Sports acquired Learn Educational Investment, a British-curriculum institution based in Abu Dhabi, adding Al Rabeeh School and Al Rabeeh Academy to its portfolio in January 2024, marking expansion into education.

title: IHC AED 5 Bn share buyback program
description: In May 2024, IHC’s Board approved a landmark AED 5 billion share buyback program to generate long-term shareholder value reflecting the company’s strong financial position and confidence in growth potential.

title: ADMO Lifestyle Holding acquisition of Alpha Mind
description: In January 2024, ADMO Lifestyle Holding acquired a 51% stake in Alpha Mind, a UAE joint venture managing global experiential lifestyle, food & beverage, and entertainment brands, for AED 214.2 Mn.

title: Alpha Dhabi Holding sale of 49% in construction subsidiary to ADQ
description: In September 2024, Alpha Dhabi Holding sold 49% of its subsidiary Alpha Dhabi Construction Holding (ADCH) to ADQ, retaining 51% control, reflecting commitment to the construction sector.

title: IHC acquisition of Al Manal Dental Centre
description: On 31 January 2024, IHC subsidiary Sky Light Corporate Management acquired multi-specialist dental services provider Al Manal Dental Centre for AED 7 Mn.

title: IHC acquisition of 87% stake in 2PointZero
description: In January 2024, IHC acquired an 87% stake in 2PointZero, a global investment platform focusing on AI and energy transition, uniting industry leaders such as Chimera Investments, Lunate Capital, Beltone Holdings, and International Resource Holding.

title: PureHealth acquisition of Sheikh Shakhbout Medical City
description: In February 2024, Abu Dhabi Health Services Company, a subsidiary of PureHealth Holding, acquired full ownership of Sheikh Shakhbout Medical City (SSMC), one of the UAE’s largest hospitals, established under Abu Dhabi’s Economic Vision 2030.

title: IHC increases stake in Grupo Nutresa
description: IHC increased its stake in Grupo Nutresa to 14.83% in 2024, strengthening its presence in Latin America's food-processing industry. Grupo Nutresa operates 47 production plants across 18 countries.

title: Modon Holding acquires Modon Properties expanding real estate portfolio
description: In February 2024, Modon Holding expanded its real estate portfolio through acquisition of Modon Properties, Abu Dhabi National Exhibitions Company (ADNEC), MIZA Investments, and other assets, enhancing its role in hospitality, sports, and community developments in UAE.

title: 2PointZero Acquires Crypto Mining Stake in Citadel
description: On April 1, 2024, 2PointZero acquired WAS Four Investment, securing 56% ownership in Citadel, a leading crypto mining company in the Middle East, enhancing its presence in digital asset and blockchain sectors.

title: Lunate Holding Acquires Remaining Equity in API Capital Management
description: On July 8, 2024, Lunate Holding, an alternative investment manager based in Abu Dhabi, completed acquisition of the remaining equity in API Capital Management, increasing its ownership to 100%.

title: Ghitha Holding Expands Stake in Al Ain Farms Livestock Production
description: On February 28, 2024, Ghitha Holding acquired an additional 12% shares in Al Ain Farms for Livestock Production through its subsidiary WAS Commercial Investment.

title: Beltone Financial Holding Acquires LXET Real Estate Firm in Egypt
description: In April 2024, Beltone Financial Holding acquired full interest in LXET, a real estate investment and marketing services firm registered in Egypt, marking Beltone's expansion and growth strategy.

title: Sirius International Holding Acquires Majority Stake in Derby Group
description: In March 2024, Sirius International Holding acquired a majority stake in Derby Group, an Abu Dhabi-based staff outsourcing company specializing in deploying over 5,000 skilled professionals in banking, financial services, and government sectors to support global digitalization.

title: ESG Capital Holding Fully Acquires Sawaeed Holding
description: At the end of April 2024, ESG Capital Holding acquired full ownership of Sawaeed Holding, a leading manpower recruitment and services company, by securing the remaining equity stake.

title: Multiply Group Acquires Dubai's Leading Outdoor Advertising Company Backlite Media
description: On March 1, 2024, Multiply Group’s subsidiary MG Communication Holding acquired Backlite Media, a premier Digital Out-of-Home advertising company in Dubai with assets in landmark locations, for AED 47 million to strengthen its media portfolio.

title: EasyLease Acquires Majority Stake in United Trans for Mobility Innovation
description: In March 2024, EasyLease Motorcycle Rentals acquired a 60% interest in United Trans General Trading to redefine mobility solutions and shape the future of transportation across GCC and MENA regions.

title: International Resources Holding Acquires Majority Stake in Mopani Copper Mines Zambia
description: On March 20, 2024, Delta Mining, a subsidiary of International Resources Holding, acquired a majority stake in Mopani Copper Mines, a mining and copper production company registered in Zambia.

title: Sirius International Holding Acquires 60% Equity in Infraports Holding
description: On March 31, 2024, Sirius International Holding acquired a 60% equity stake in Infraports Holding, an Abu Dhabi-registered company specializing in infrastructure for transportation and public safety sectors, including navigation, surveillance, meteorological systems, and other airport services, for AED 31.2 million.

title: Multiply Group’s Omorfia Group Acquires The Grooming Company in UAE
description: On June 12, 2024, Omorfia Group, majority-owned by Multiply Group, acquired 100% stake in The Grooming Company, a premier salon and beauty services provider in the UAE, for AED 379.4 million to accelerate growth.

title: Sky Light Corporate Management Acquires Al Manal Dental Centre
description: On January 31, 2024, Sky Light Corporate Management acquired multi-specialist dental service provider Al Manal Dental Centre for AED 7 million.

title: Arena Event Services Group Acquires UK-based Showblock Group
description: On April 30, 2024, Arena Event Services Group acquired 100% interest in Showblock Group, a UK-based event and non-event infrastructure company operating in 12 countries, for AED 12.4 million, reinforcing Arena’s position as global leader in events infrastructure.

title: 2PointZero acquires stake in Elsewedy Electric
description: In July 2024, 2PointZero acquired a 19.98% stake, later increased to 20.37%, in Elsewedy Electric, an Egyptian multinational specializing in integrated cables, electrical products, and energy solutions, thus strengthening its presence in the sector.

title: Emirates Driving Company acquires Excellence Premier Investment
description: In July 2024, Emirates Driving Company acquired a 51% stake for AED 194.4 million in Excellence Premier Investment, enhancing driver training in the UAE with advanced and customized training programs.

title: Esyasoft Holding acquires majority stake in Float for smart water tech
description: Esyasoft Holding acquired a 70% stake in Float, a Netherlands-based company specializing in smart water management, enhancing advanced meter reading and remote monitoring solutions for water utilities.

title: International Financial Assets acquires Funder.AI private financing platform
description: In September 2024, International Financial Assets Holding acquired a 75% interest for AED 60.6 million in Funder.AI (also eFunder), a private financing platform specializing in digital lending solutions for SMEs.

title: Sirius Digitech acquires AI and cloud specialist Parserlabs India
description: At the end of September 2024, Sirius Digitech acquired a 77.5% stake in Parserlabs India, an AI and cloud platform provider offering secure and compliant cloud services for AI applications, for AED 67.9 million.

title: EasyLease acquires Gallega Group Holding, diversifies beyond mobility
description: In October 2024, EasyLease Motorcycle Rental acquired a majority equity interest in Gallega Group Holding, a multi-sector integrated logistics service provider, for AED 57.5 million, expanding its portfolio beyond mobility solutions.

title: ADMO Lifestyle acquires Cyprus food and beverage company Selmondo
description: On 1 October 2024, ADMO Lifestyle Holding completed a 51% acquisition in Selmondo, a Cyprus-based food and beverage company, for AED 28.7 million, entering the Cyprus lifestyle market.

title: EPointZero acquires Reem Energy Holding
description: In November 2024, EPointZero Holding acquired full ownership of Reem Energy Holding, a company specializing in real estate, intellectual property, and asset management across various sectors.

title: Ghitha subsidiary acquires canned food manufacturer
description: Zee Stores International, a subsidiary of Ghitha Holding, acquired a 70.09% equity in Fujairah-based canned food manufacturer, International Food Industries, for AED 41 million in November 2024.

title: Enersol acquires global oil & gas diagnostics company EV Holdings
description: Enersol, the ADNOC Drilling and Alpha Dhabi venture, took full control of EV Holdings, a global leader in vision-based diagnostics for oil and gas, in a $45 million deal.

title: Modon Properties enters European luxury real estate market
description: Modon Properties acquired full ownership of La Zagaleta, an exclusive and luxurious residential golf estate in Spain, for AED 356.4 million in December 2024.

title: ADNEC Group acquires catering and events company
description: ADNEC Group, a wholly owned subsidiary of Modon Holding, acquired full ownership of Royal Catering Services for AED 53.9 million in December 2024. Royal Catering Services serves sectors including energy, defense, healthcare, education, and events with a team of over 2,500.

title: Al Ain Farms to acquire Arabian Farms Investment
description: Al Ain Farms for Livestock Production, a subsidiary of Ghitha Holding, signed a share purchase agreement to acquire full ownership of Arabian Farms Investment, known for its poultry products. The acquisition is expected to complete in the first quarter of 2025.
companies_mentioned: Al Ain Farms for Livestock Production

title: International Tech Group Acquires Additional Emircom Stake
description: International Tech Group, an IHC subsidiary, acquired an additional 46% stake in Emircom, a leading IT infrastructure services provider in the UAE, for AED 292 million in October 2024. This aligns with IHC’s strategy to expand its digital assets portfolio.

title: ADNEC Acquires Business Design Centre in London
description: London International Exhibition Center Holding, a subsidiary of ADNEC Group, acquired full ownership of the Business Design Centre, a leading trade and exhibition venue in London, for AED 474.4 million on 29 October 2024. This acquisition supports ADNEC's long-term growth strategy.

title: Esyasoft Acquires UK Utility Consulting Firm Engage Consulting
description: Esyasoft Holding acquired Engage Consulting, a UK-based utility consulting company specializing in energy and utility sectors, for AED 43.9 million on 30 October 2024, expanding its presence in the energy and utility market.

title: 2PointZero Acquires Maseera Holding for Financial Inclusion
description: 2PointZero acquired full ownership of Maseera Holding for Financial Investments, an Egypt-based microfinance and financial services company focused on supporting low- and middle-income individuals and MSMEs, on 30 October 2024, reinforcing its commitment to financial inclusion in underserved economies.

title: Al Seer Marine Acquires Remaining Interest of DTEC Industries
description: Al Seer Marine Supplies and Equipment Company acquired the remaining equity interest in DTEC Industries, becoming 100% owner. DTEC provides industrial participation services for the global defense and security market. The deal was finalized on 31 October 2024.

title: Enersol Acquires 95% Stake in Deep Well Services
description: Enersol, a joint venture of ADNOC Drilling Company and Alpha Dhabi Holding, agreed to acquire 95% stake in Deep Well Services, a firm specializing in advanced energy technologies and services, for approximately USD 223 million in October 2024.

title: Dune JV Expands Into Commercial Shipbuilding
description: Al Seer Marine and Damen International's joint venture, Dune, announced expansion from naval shipbuilding into commercial shipbuilding on 11 November 2024. The JV plans to construct over 26 vessels in 2025 for domestic and international clients.

title: IHC Reports 52% Growth in Total Assets in FY 2024
description: IHC reported a remarkable growth of 52.0% in its total assets base for the fiscal year 2024 compared to the previous year, driven by portfolio growth and key partnerships.

title: IHC Increases Total Debt to AED 71.8 Billion in FY 2024
description: IHC's total debt rose to AED 71.8 billion in FY 2024 from AED 48.5 billion in the previous year, primarily due to net loan drawdowns of AED 10.3 billion, loans acquired through business combinations amounting to AED 12.1 billion, and AED 6.9 billion in non-convertible sukuks.

title: Issuance of AED 1.8 Billion Non-Convertible Green Sukuk by Aldar Investment Properties Sukuk Limited
description: Aldar Investment Properties Sukuk Limited, a subsidiary of IHC, issued a non-convertible green sukuk valued at AED 1.8 billion with a profit rate of 5.5% per annum, payable semi-annually, and due for repayment in May 2034.

title: IHC Reports Outstanding Financial Performance and Double-Digit Revenue Growth in 2024
description: IHC demonstrated resilience and adaptability in 2024, achieving a 54.2% revenue growth and maintaining a profit after tax of AED 25.7 billion, with profit after tax attributable to owners at AED 15.8 billion. The company saw significant increases in non-current assets (+23.0%), particularly in Property, Plant & Equipment (+69%) and intangible assets and goodwill (+65.9%), driven by acquisitions. Current assets increased by 79.1%, mainly due to increases in trade receivables, investments in financial assets, and inventories related to land plots including Modon Properties PJSC acquired during the year. Liabilities also increased, with non-current liabilities up by 31.8% and current liabilities by 60.2%, attributing to increases in borrowings, deferred tax liabilities, trade payables, and contract liabilities.

title: IHC Reports Significant Revenue Growth in FY24 Led by Real Estate and Marine & Dredging Segments
description: IHC's revenue increased by 54.2% in FY24 to AED 92.7 billion, driven primarily by strong performances in the Real Estate segment, which contributed 37.1% of total revenue with 66.7% YoY growth due to record development sales by Aldar and Modon. Additionally, the Marine & Dredging segment contributed 29.7% of gross revenue with a 53% YoY growth driven by NMDC Group's ongoing projects and healthy order books. Revenue generation was predominantly in the UAE (76%) with the remainder from international markets including KSA, Egypt, and India.

title: IHC Experiences Decrease in EBIT Due to Lower Profit from Associates and Joint Ventures
description: IHC’s EBIT decreased by 14.8% to AED 30.7 billion in FY24, mainly due to a fall in share of profit from investments in associates and joint ventures from AED 13.2 billion in FY23 to AED 1.6 billion in FY24. This decline follows a one-time fair value gain of AED 12.2 billion from the acquisition of a 49% stake in Modon Properties recognized in FY23.

title: IHC Reports Strong Net Profit and Earnings Per Share in FY24
description: Despite EBIT decline, IHC maintained a strong net profit of AED 25.7 billion for FY24, translating to earnings per share of AED 7.2. Profit after tax attributable to owners was AED 15.8 billion, demonstrating the company’s continued commitment to enhancing shareholder value.

title: Divestment of 49% of Alpha Dhabi Construction Holding to ADQ
description: Alpha Dhabi Holding completed the divestment of 49% of its subsidiary Alpha Dhabi Construction Holding to ADQ, an Abu Dhabi-based investment and holding company. Alpha Dhabi Holding retained a 51% shareholding in ADCH, continuing its strategic partnership with ADQ.

title: Strategic transaction uniting Cheval Blanc Maldives and Seychelles with NCT&H
description: Alpha Dhabi Holding announced a strategic transaction that united Cheval Blanc Maldives and Cheval Blanc Seychelles with the National Corporation for Tourism and Hotels (NCT&H).
tags: National Corporation for Tourism and Hotels
companies_mentioned: National Corporation for Tourism and Hotels

title: Acquisition of CÉ LA VI and JV with Addmind Holding called Alphamind
description: Alpha Dhabi Holding’s luxury lifestyle subsidiary ADMO Lifestyle Holding announced the acquisition of CÉ LA VI and a joint venture with Addmind Holding named Alphamind.

title: NMDC Energy PJSC IPO on Abu Dhabi Securities Exchange
description: NMDC Energy PJSC, providing engineering, procurement, and construction services for offshore and onshore energy clients, began trading on the Abu Dhabi Securities Exchange following a 31 times oversubscribed IPO.

title: Enersol RSC Ltd completed four transactions valued close to USD 800m
description: Enersol RSC Ltd completed four transactions involving Gordon Technologies, NTS, EV Cam, and Deep Well, with a combined value close to USD 800 million.

title: Plenty Unlimited Inc. partnership for region-wide indoor vertical farming
description: Plenty Unlimited Inc. entered into an exclusive, multi-year, region-wide partnership to bring locally grown fresh produce based on indoor vertical farm technology to countries across the GCC.

title: Formation of Enersol Energy Solutions Joint Venture
description: Enersol Energy Solutions was founded in 2016 as a joint venture between Alpha Dhabi and ADNOC Drilling headquartered in Abu Dhabi, aimed at enhancing technological capabilities within the energy sector.

title: TA’ZIZ Industrial Hub Launch in UAE
description: TA’ZIZ is an industrial hub in the UAE designed to foster innovation and growth across chemical and industrial sectors, consisting of three zones: Industrial Chemical Zone, Light Industrial Zone, and Industrial Services Zone, supporting sustainable industrial expansion.

title: Kalyon Enerji's Renewable Energy Focus
description: Kalyon Enerji, a subsidiary of Kalyon Holding Turkey, specializes in renewable energy projects, particularly solar and wind energy, aiming to develop clean and sustainable energy solutions.

title: Trojan Construction Group as UAE's Largest Construction Company
description: Trojan Construction Group is recognized as the largest construction group by revenue in the UAE, with a diverse portfolio including residential, commercial, and major infrastructure projects.

title: NCT&H's Role in Promoting Abu Dhabi Tourism
description: The National Corporation for Tourism & Hotels (NCT&H) plays a vital role in promoting Abu Dhabi as an international tourist destination by showcasing regional heritage and inter-cultural diversity.

title: ADMO Lifestyle Holding Global Expansion Plans
description: ADMO Lifestyle Holding aims to build a global group of high-end lifestyle, hospitality, food & beverage, and entertainment brands with flagship locations in Singapore and Dubai and developments in London, Miami, and Abu Dhabi.

title: NICC's Infrastructure Construction Expertise
description: National Infrastructure Construction Company (NICC) based in UAE specializes in infrastructure projects including railway infrastructure, terminals, facilities, and depots, focusing on building efficient and durable infrastructure.

title: Launch of Wio Bank Financial Platform
description: Launched in 2022, Wio Bank is an innovative online financial platform that offers co-managed financial services with embedded finance and banking-as-a-service (BaaS) to optimize client financial operations.

title: Alpha Wave Private Credit Fund Launch
description: Alpha Wave Private Credit, LP is a US$2 billion evergreen private credit fund launched in 2022, co-managed by Alpha Wave Global and Lunate Capital, targeting credit opportunities with attractive risk-adjusted returns.

title: Establishment of MICAD Credit Joint Venture
description: MICAD Credit is a joint venture between ADH and Mubadala Investment Company established in 2023, focusing on identifying and capitalizing on compelling credit opportunities in various sectors and geographies.

title: Trojan Construction Group's Inaugural ESG Report and MSCI ESG 'A' Rating
description: Trojan Construction Group published its first ESG report and became the first construction company in the UAE to secure a provisional 'A' rating in the MSCI ESG assessment. The company also became a signatory to the UN Global Compact and its 10 Principles related to human rights, labor, environment, and anti-corruption.

title: Mawarid Holding's Inaugural Sustainability Report and ESG Enhancements
description: Mawarid Holding published its inaugural annual Sustainability Report showcasing its ESG progress and reaffirmed its commitment to transparency and accountability in sustainable practices. The company, also a signatory to the UN Global Compact, enhanced its ESG policies and pioneered nature-based climate solutions to sustain desert biodiversity. Mawarid Holding launched subsidiaries focusing on smart water technology to preserve water resources.

title: Extension of Mubadala-AlDAR Joint Ventures
description: Aldar Properties PJSC extended its long-standing partnership with Mubadala to establish a series of joint ventures aimed at owning and managing assets across Abu Dhabi.

title: AED 1 Billion Investment to Expand Logistics Platform in UAE
description: Aldar expanded its logistics platform across the UAE with a AED 1 billion investment including a partnership with DP World and acquisition of 7 central logistics hubs and adjacent land plots, increasing Aldar’s total logistics GLA in UAE to over 400,000 sqm.

title: Introduction of Iconic Hotel Brands in Abu Dhabi
description: Aldar undertook a AED 1.5 billion transformation of its hospitality portfolio introducing the Waldorf Astoria and Vignette Collection brands as part of its partnership with IHG Hotels & Resorts.

title: AED 5 Billion Investment to Develop Income-Generating Assets in Abu Dhabi
description: Aldar plans to deploy AED 5 billion between 2025 and 2027 to develop a range of income-generating real estate assets within key destinations in Abu Dhabi, signaling an important milestone to activate its landbank further using a develop-and-hold approach.

title: Entry Into Dubai Commercial Real Estate Segment
description: Aldar made an entry into the Dubai commercial real estate segment through a AED 1.8 billion investment that includes the development of an iconic office tower on Sheikh Zayed Road and acquisition of the 'Falak' tower, followed by a AED 2.3 billion acquisition of a flagship commercial tower in DIFC.

title: Aldar Development Property Development and Sales
description: Aldar Development focuses on the development and sales of prime properties located in the UAE's most desirable communities.

title: Aldar Investment Hospitality Portfolio Management
description: Aldar Investment owns, operates, and manages a portfolio of hotels and leisure assets primarily located in Abu Dhabi and Ras Al Khaimah.

title: Aldar Development Property Management Services
description: Aldar Development provides project delivery services as a key partner to the Abu Dhabi government for national housing and infrastructure projects.

title: Aldar Investment Education Sector Management
description: Aldar Investment is the leading private education provider in Abu Dhabi managing 31 schools across Abu Dhabi, Dubai, and the Northern Emirates.

title: Aldar Development International Estates Operations
description: Aldar Development operates real estate development platforms internationally, including SODIC in Egypt and London Square in the UK.

title: Aldar Investment Investment Properties Asset Management
description: Aldar Investment manages a primary asset portfolio comprising retail, residential, commercial, and logistics prime real estate assets.

title: Implementation of Low-Carbon Design Guidelines by Aldar
description: Aldar implemented low-carbon design guidelines that resulted in a 30% improvement in energy use, a 40% improvement in water use by design, adoption of 95% green concrete, and incorporation of low-carbon steel in construction projects.

title: AED 113 Million Investment in Retrofitting and Solar PV Projects by Aldar
description: Aldar invested AED 113 million in retrofitting and a solar photovoltaic project across 45 assets. The solar project is scheduled to be operational by the end of 2025 and will generate 12%-15% of energy demand, significantly reducing emissions from purchased electricity.

title: Achieving Sustainability Certifications by Aldar Projects
description: Aldar's sustainability efforts include certifications such as 100% of designed residential projects achieving a minimum 3 Pearl Estidama rating; 82% of new projects achieving a 2 Star Fitwel Rating; 20% of retrofitted assets receiving LEED Gold or Platinum certification.

title: NMDC Group 58% Profit and 57% Revenue Increase
description: NMDC Group achieved a 58% increase in profit before tax and a 57% increase in revenue in 2024, showcasing solid growth across its operations in dredging, marine, and energy sectors.

title: NMDC Group Expansion into Southeast Asia with Coastal Protection Projects
description: NMDC Group expanded into Southeast Asia through a preliminary agreement for large-scale coastal protection projects with Vietnam’s Vingroup and secured an EPC contract for a subsea pipeline in Taiwan.

title: Launch of NMDC LTS for Regional Logistics and Services
description: NMDC Group launched a new business unit, NMDC LTS, aimed at capitalizing on regional logistics and services opportunities through enhanced operational efficiency and technical capabilities.

title: NMDC Group to Acquire Controlling Stake in Emdad LLC
description: NMDC Group signed a binding agreement to acquire a controlling stake in Emdad LLC to expand its presence in O&M services in the energy sector; transaction expected to close in Q2 2025.

title: Launch of NMDC Logistics and Technical Services BU
description: In 2024, NMDC Logistics and Technical Services BU was established to drive the Group’s growth strategy by consolidating its position as the UAE’s largest marine fleet owner and vessel charterer. This new business unit aims to expand NMDC’s reach into marine logistics and facilitate entry into new markets.

title: NMDC Energy’s Renewable Projects and Energy Transition Efforts
description: NMDC Energy PJSC continues as a leader in EPC solutions for oil and gas, operating 18 offshore vessels and advanced fabrication yards. It is also driving energy transition efforts through renewable projects, establishing global partnerships, and leveraging innovative technologies.

title: NMDC Energy Listed on ADX
description: NMDC Energy was listed on the Abu Dhabi Securities Exchange (ADX) on 30 August 2024. The listing marks the company's official entry into the public financial markets, aiming to enhance its visibility and access to capital.

title: NMDC Energy reports 82% revenue growth and 96% net profit increase in 2024
description: NMDC Energy reported strong financial performance in 2024, with revenues growing 82% year-over-year and net profit before tax almost doubling with a 96% increase. Total assets stood at AED 16.5 billion by the end of 2024.

title: Inauguration of NMDC Energy's AED 200 million fabrication yard in Saudi Arabia
description: NMDC Energy inaugurated a state-of-the-art 400,000 sqm fabrication yard in Ras Al Khair Special Economic Zone, Saudi Arabia, with an investment of AED 200 million. This yard will provide offshore facilities fabrication and onshore modularization.

title: NMDC Energy awarded USD 1.14 billion EPC contract for Taiwan subsea gas pipeline project
description: NMDC Energy was awarded a strategic EPC contract valued at USD 1.14 billion from Taiwan Power Company (Taipower) for the subsea gas pipeline project including pipeline installation, shore approach works, and dredging for Tung-Hsiao Power Plant 2nd stage renewal.

title: NMDC Energy IPO raises AED 3.2 billion to strengthen growth
description: NMDC Energy successfully completed its IPO, raising AED 3.2 billion (AED 2.8 billion in cash and AED 0.4 billion in-kind), boosting the Group’s balance sheet and positioning it for future growth and expansion in offshore and onshore oil, gas, and renewables sectors.

title: NMDC's Sustainability Strategy and Initiatives
description: NMDC has implemented a comprehensive sustainability strategy comprising eight core objectives and 25 initiatives focusing on environmentally conscious operations, energy transition enablement, community and stakeholder engagement, health and safety ownership, and transparency and accountability.

title: Supply Chain Compliance Screening
description: NMDC ensured 100% supplier screening following the Business Partner Code of Conduct to promote responsible and sustainable business practices throughout its supply chain in 2024.

title: GHG Inventory Establishment for 2023-2024
description: NMDC built its first comprehensive Greenhouse Gas Inventory for the years 2023 (baseline) and 2024, including Scopes 1, 2, and 3, under the Greenhouse Gas Protocol to measure emissions accurately.

title: Falcon Program Transformation
description: The in-house Falcon Program piloted 30 initiatives across NMDC Group in 2024, resulting in cost savings, operational benefits, reduction in carbon emissions, enhanced material efficiency, and waste minimization.

title: Health & Safety Awards Achieved
description: NMDC received the Royal Society for Prevention of Accidents (ROSPA) and the British Safety Council’s Sword of Honour Award for excellence in health, safety, wellbeing, and environmental management in 2024.

title: AI-Subsea Inspections with SAFEEN ROV
description: NMDC Group implemented AI-powered initiatives including the SAFEEN ROV, an unmanned vessel that monitors underwater environments to enhance safety, efficiency, and environmental performance by minimizing human involvement in 2024.

title: NMDC’s AA ESG Rating by MSCI
description: NMDC received an AA ESG rating from MSCI, one of the highest ratings within the UAE’s Construction & Engineering sector, recognizing the company’s environmental, social, and governance performance in 2024.

title: PUREHEALTH Listed on ADX
description: PUREHEALTH was listed on the Abu Dhabi Securities Exchange (ADX) on 20 December 2023, marking its official entry into the public stock market.

title: PureHealth Acquires Circle Health Group
description: In January 2024, PureHealth completed the 100% acquisition of Circle Health Group, the UK’s largest private hospital network. This acquisition added over 50 hospitals and more than 9,000 employees to PureHealth’s portfolio.

title: PureHealth Acquires SSMC in UAE
description: Effective 1 February 2024, PureHealth acquired 100% shareholding of Sheikh Khalifa Medical City (SSMC), the UAE’s largest healthcare facility. This acquisition strengthened specialized and complex care services and expanded the Group’s capacity to serve more patients.

title: PureHealth Launches Sakina Mental Health Initiative
description: In 2024, PureHealth launched 'Sakina', a mental health initiative aligned with Abu Dhabi’s mental health strategy aimed at promoting positive mental health and increasing access to mental health services.

title: Sheikh Khalifa Medical City Designated Centre of Excellence for Paediatric Cardiac Surgery
description: In 2024, the Department of Health announced Sheikh Khalifa Medical City (SKMC) as a Centre of Excellence for Paediatric Cardiac Surgery, establishing the largest heart program for children in the UAE and the only such program in Abu Dhabi.

title: PureHealth Rated Top Healthcare Performer in Middle East by Sustainalytics
description: PureHealth earned a 'Low Risk' ESG risk management rating from Sustainalytics, marking it as the top healthcare performer in the Middle East.

title: IHC Partners with Non-Profit Organizations for Healthcare and Community Initiatives
description: IHC partnered with various non-profit organizations including Emirates Foundation and Supreme Council for Motherhood & Childhood to improve healthcare access, promote health equity, and support education programs such as Emirati Women Chapter under H.H. Sheikha Fatima bint Mubarak's patronage.

title: IHC Launches First Sustainability Report and CDP Climate Change Disclosure
description: IHC launched its inaugural Sustainability Report and submitted its first Climate Change disclosure to the Carbon Disclosure Project (CDP) to enhance corporate transparency and climate action strategies.

title: PureHealth Incorporates Net Zero Strategy into Growth and Acquisition Plans
description: PureHealth is implementing an ambitious Net Zero Strategy across its businesses to ensure sustainability as a core growth driver, aligning every new acquisition with environmental and social goals to scale its positive impact.

title: Expansion of Response Plus Holding into new international markets
description: Response Plus Holding PJSC (RPM), a pre-hospital care and emergency medical services provider, has expanded its operations into Jordan, UK, Norway, and is enhancing presence across the GCC and Africa.

title: Development of first-of-its-kind AI solutions in occupational health
description: Response Plus Holding is collaborating with partners including Omran AI, Dr. Rohil Raghavan, and Johns Hopkins Aramco Healthcare (JHAH) to develop innovative AI solutions focused on occupational health.

title: Response Plus Holding listed on Abu Dhabi Securities Exchange
description: Response Plus Holding PJSC is listed on the Abu Dhabi Securities Exchange (ADX), signifying its prominence as a trusted name in the emergency care and energy sector healthcare services.

title: Foray into Wind Energy business with Prometheus Medical International
description: IHC is entering the Wind Energy sector through a partnership or business expansion with Prometheus Medical International, signaling diversification into renewable energy.

title: Human Energy Health and Wellbeing Award launch with Burjeel Holdings
description: IHC in conjunction with Burjeel Holdings launched the Human Energy Health and Wellbeing Award aimed at boosting workplace wellness across the global energy sector.
tags: Human Energy Health and Wellbeing Award

title: Multiply Group Acquires Backlite Media
description: Multiply Group acquired 100% of Backlite Media, a premier digital out-of-home (DOOH) advertising company known for its assets in iconic UAE locations such as Sheikh Zayed Road, Dubai and Galleria Mall, Abu Dhabi, to expand its footprint in the out-of-home (OOH) advertising sector.

title: Omorfia Group Acquires The Grooming Company Holding
description: Omorfia Group, the beauty anchor of Multiply Group, acquired 100% of The Grooming Company Holding (TGCH), expanding its beauty vertical to 132 owned and operated salons across five key markets. TGCH owns leading brands including N.Bar, 1847, and Sisters Beauty Lounge.

title: Emirates Driving Company Acquires Stake in Excellence Premier Investment
description: Emirates Driving Company (EDC), under Multiply Group's mobility vertical, acquired a 51% stake in Excellence Premier Investment LLC, the parent company of Excellence Driving Centre, as part of its strategy to expand and enhance its distinguished driving services.

title: Multiply Group's 2024 Efficiency Initiative
description: Multiply Group's 2024 “Year of Efficiency” identified up to AED 45 million in run-rate EBITDA uplift through revenue synergies, cost optimization, digital transformation, and AI-driven initiatives to automate processes.

title: Kalyon Enerji operates Europe's largest solar power plant
description: Kalyon Enerji, based in Istanbul, operates Europe's largest solar power plant with a capacity of 1,350 MWDC and leads renewable energy projects under exclusive partnerships with Kalyon Holding and International Energy Holding umbrellas.

title: Pal Cooling leads UAE district cooling industry
description: Pal Cooling Holding is a leading provider in the UAE's district cooling sector, serving landmark residential, commercial, and mixed-use developments with services such as central plant water cooling for air conditioning.

title: BackLite Media offers innovative out-of-home advertising in Dubai
description: BackLite Media, a premier out-of-home media company, provides innovative advertising solutions including exclusive partnerships such as with Dubai’s Roads and Transport Authority (RTA), with prime locations on Sheikh Zayed Road.

title: Media 247 operates premium outdoor advertising in Dubai
description: Media 247 is a specialised outdoor advertising solutions provider with over 45 premium outdoor hoardings and unipolar locations strategically positioned in key areas within Dubai.

title: Viola Communications expands as integrated marketing provider in Abu Dhabi
description: Viola Communications has grown into one of the largest communications firms in Abu Dhabi, delivering fully integrated marketing and communications solutions to national and regional clients.

title: Firefly pioneer in street-level digital media in New York
description: New York-based Firefly works with taxi companies and rideshare drivers to install proprietary digital advertising displays on vehicles, pioneering street-level digital media platforms.

title: Emirates Driving Company leads driver education in Abu Dhabi
description: The Emirates Driving Company is the largest provider of driver education in Abu Dhabi and government’s trusted partner for creating safer roads.

title: TAQA invests in power, water, oil and gas in 11 countries
description: TAQA, one of EMEA’s largest listed integrated utility companies, operates power, water, and oil & gas operations in 11 countries across four continents.

title: Savage X Fenty e-commerce fashion brand launched by Rihanna
description: Savage X Fenty is a direct-to-consumer e-commerce fashion company launched in 2018 by popstar Rihanna, focusing on celebrating individuality and broadening the definition of beauty.

title: Omorfia Group prominent beauty sector provider in GCC
description: Omorfia Group comprises popular personal care and beauty salon brands in the GCC, including Tips & Toes, Bedashing Beauty Lounge, N.Bar, Sisters Beauty Lounge, and 1847.

title: EIG Breakwater Energy owns 25% stake in Repsol E&P
description: Breakwater Energy, a wholly owned subsidiary of EIG, is a leading institutional investor in the global energy and infrastructure sectors and holds a 25% stake in Repsol Exploration & Production.

title: Yieldmo backed by Google Ventures and Union Square Ventures
description: Yieldmo is a digital advertising and attention analytics company based in New York, backed by investors Google Ventures and Union Square Ventures.

title: Getty Images provides global visual content solutions
description: Getty Images is a global provider and marketplace for visual content, delivering comprehensive content solutions to customers worldwide.

title: Establishment of ESG Integration Framework
description: In 2024, the Group established an ESG Integration framework to seamlessly incorporate ESG factors into investment analysis, due diligence, operational decision-making processes, and stewardship activities.

title: Plastic Waste Reduction Beach Cleanup
description: A dedicated team of employees from the Group collected over 300 pounds of plastic waste in a beach cleanup in Al Bahia, demonstrating the Group’s commitment to sustainability and environmental impact.

title: Launch of 'Read to Lead' Literacy Program
description: Multiply Group launched the ‘Read to Lead’ program to expand access to books and learning resources for communities in need. As part of the program, the Group partnered with Book Aid International to donate over 5,000 new books to local NGO partners across the Middle East.

title: EDC Acquires 51% Stake in Excellence Premier Investment LLC
description: Emirates Driving Company PJSC (EDC) has acquired a 51% stake in Excellence Premier Investment LLC, aiming to elevate driver training in the UAE by developing advanced training curricula and customized training programs tailored to diverse user needs.

title: EDC Earns AAA ESG Rating from MSCI
description: Emirates Driving Company PJSC received an AAA ESG rating from MSCI in March 2024, positioning it among the top 9% of companies in the consumer services industry. This achievement highlights EDC's commitment to environmental, social, and governance standards.

title: EDC Commits to Net Zero Plan Validated Through SBTi
description: Emirates Driving Company PJSC became one of the first ten companies in the UAE to commit to a net zero plan and validate it through the Science Based Targets initiative (SBTi), demonstrating leadership in sustainability and climate responsibility.

title: EDC Develops Advanced Driver Training Services
description: Emirates Driving Company introduced three new services/products: UAC testing, Class Restructuring, and the Train the Trainers Program, strengthening its role as a leader in professional development and quality assurance in driver training.

title: Acquisition by Excellence Premier Investment to enhance driver training
description: Excellence Premier Investment, a Dubai-based company operating across driving education, delivery services, luxury transportation, and vehicle maintenance with 1,150 employees and 1,044 vehicles, has made an acquisition aimed at elevating driver training in the UAE. The acquisition focuses on developing advanced training curricula and customized training programs tailored to diverse user needs.

title: Tabieah Property Investment's real estate development on Saadiyat Island
description: Tabieah Property Investment, established in 2017 as part of a strategic asset allocation to invest in real estate, owns and manages a luxury residential building located on Saadiyat Island in Abu Dhabi, representing its commitment to property investment and development excellence.

title: Emirates Mobility Company advancing accessible and sustainable mobility solutions
description: Emirates Mobility Company, a subsidiary focused on mobility sector innovation, is investing in accessible, safe, and sustainable mobility solutions in the region. Its mission is to become a leading regional investor in cutting-edge mobility with transformative products and services, unlocking new growth opportunities in ground transportation.

title: Emirates Driving Company Achieves High ESG Score
description: Emirates Driving Company received an ESG score of 9.7 out of 10 from MSCI, achieving an AAA rating in 2024. This score places EDC in the top 9% of the consumer services industry, reflecting its strong commitment to sustainability, social responsibility, and governance.

title: IHC Achieves 50% Waste Recycling Rate
description: IHC improved its waste recycling rate to 50% in 2024, which is a 28% increase compared to the previous year.

title: Emirati Female Employment at 73%
description: 73% of IHC's Emirati employees are female in 2024, highlighting the company's focus on diversity and inclusion in its workforce.

title: Net Zero Target Validation by SBTi
description: IHC received validation for its Net Zero Targets from the Science Based Targets initiative (SBTi) in 2024, confirming its commitment to reducing carbon emissions and achieving net zero.

title: Modon combines Q Holding, Modon Properties, ADNEC Group, and ancillary assets
description: In February 2024, Modon combined Q Holding, Modon Properties, ADNEC Group, and ancillary assets, strengthening its portfolio and positioning the Group for accelerated growth.

title: ADQ appoints Modon as master developer for Ras El Hekma megaproject
description: ADQ appointed Modon as master developer for the 170 million sqm Ras El Hekma megaproject in Egypt, a transformative milestone witnessed by UAE and Egypt Presidents in 2024.

title: Launch of successful real estate developments in UAE including Nawayef East, Nawayef West, and Maysan
description: Modon launched successful developments across the UAE, including Nawayef East and Nawayef West on Hudayriyat Island and Maysan on Reem Island in Abu Dhabi, reinforcing its leading position in the real estate sector in 2024.

title: Modon hosts 12.2 million visitors through events and destinations
description: In 2024, Modon hosted 12.2 million visitors for events and destinations including ADNEC and ExCel London and delivered the world's largest man-made wave pool facility hosting the World Surf League Championship Tour.

title: Strategic acquisitions and expansion by Modon
description: Modon expanded locally and internationally in 2024 through acquisitions such as Royal Catering in Abu Dhabi, Business Design Centre in London, La Zagaleta in Spain, and launched Four Seasons Rabat in Morocco.

title: Modon establishes strategic partnerships with key entities
description: Modon established strategic partnerships with entities including Orascom Construction, Elsewedy Electric, Abu Dhabi Airports, TAQA, Valderrama, Burjeel, and EMSTEEL in 2024 to enhance its business operations and growth.

title: IHC Drives UAE Real Estate Development Through Modon Real Estate
description: IHC's Modon Real Estate serves as the group's UAE real estate development arm, driving the creation of visionary and connected destinations that integrate living, leisure, and business while promoting sustainable urban development and community enrichment.

title: Modon International Real Estate Expands IHC's Global Sustainable Development
description: Modon International Real Estate, the international development arm of IHC, creates connected destinations in markets outside the UAE, integrating living, leisure, and business while advancing sustainable urban development and enriching communities worldwide.

title: IHC Expands Global Growth and Diversification via Modon International Growth
description: IHC's Modon International Growth spearheads the group's global expansion and diversification efforts, delivering impactful developments and strategic investments to create lasting value and drive international success.

title: ADNEC Group Advances IHC's Events and Leisure Portfolio
description: IHC's ADNEC Group delivers innovative experiences and services across its events and leisure portfolio, creating exceptional and tailored experiences that engage and inspire target audiences, setting industry-leading standards.

title: Modon Communities Optimizes Destination Performance for IHC
description: IHC's Modon Communities optimizes destination performance and maximizes returns by enhancing liveability and experiences through integrated community, property, retail, and facility management solutions.

title: Launch of Group International Sustainability Strategy 2025-2029
description: Modon launched its combined Group International Sustainability Strategy for the period 2025-2029 to align ESG practices across its global operations towards collective sustainability goals.

title: Strategic Partnerships to Advance Net Zero Goals
description: Modon established strategic partnerships with EmSteel to use Green Steel, Tadweer to expand waste management systems, and Emirates Water and Electricity Company (EWEC) to set trade agreements on Renewable Energy Certificates, all aligned with its Net Zero Goals.

title: CSR Initiatives to Reduce Food Waste and Improve Accessibility
description: Modon executed impactful CSR initiatives including donating all unused food to foundations across the UAE in collaboration with NE’MA (National Food Loss and Waste Initiative) and conducting People of Determination accessibility assessments across Modon assets.
